I am so pleased that i enrolled on this course.  There is so much i did not know in mysql and this course has helped me so much.
This is a great course.  I purchased the course with the aim of improving on mysql skills, but rather, i have improved mysql skills and also gained some PHP knowledge as well.  Richard is a great teacher who delivers as promised.  Thanks again to Richard and the Udemy team.
